sn45.6:1.2: Atha kho annataro bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankami …pe… ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn45.6:1.4: Katamam nu kho, bhante, brahmacariyam, katamam brahmacariyapariyosanan”ti?
sn45.6:2.1: “Ayameva kho, bhikkhu, ariyo atthangiko maggo brahmacariyam, seyyathidam—
sn45.6:2.3: Yo kho, bhikkhu, ragakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo—
